input_images.title: Input image files
input_images.description: Input image files in formats accepted by AFNI

sfint_file.title: Interval definitions file
sfint_file.description: Filename which contains the interval definitions. Default is 'sfint'. Example: '3*# 5*rest 4*A 5*rest 4*B 5*rest 4*A 5*rest'

baseline_state.title: Baseline state
baseline_state.description: Task state name to use as the baseline. Default is 'rest'.

local_base_option.title: Local base flag
local_base_option.description: Flag to indicate if each non-base task state interval should have the mean of the two nearest base intervals subtracted instead of the grand mean of all the base task intervals.

output_prefix.title: Output prefix
output_prefix.description: Prefix for output image filenames for all states. The i'th interval with task state name 'fred' will be written to file 'pname.fred.i'. Default is 'sfim'.
